title: Aggressive Retsuko (ONA) (Aggretsuko)
synopsis: Some offices have stereotypical dynamics: the chauvinistic pig of a boss who never does any real work; the employees whose goal is to suck up to the boss; the ones whose lives seem perfect; and the individuals who have all the actual work pushed onto them. Retsuko the red panda is in the last group, as she stays late most nights to make up the work her coworkers are too lazy to do themselves.
related_anime: ['Aggressive Retsuko', 'Aggressive Retsuko: We Wish You a Metal Christmas', 'Aggressive Retsuko (ONA) 2nd Season']
